item.title: Practicing Inhibition and Selection
item.dc:creator: @davclark
item.description:
Thanks for taking an interest in the materials I presented at ISCS 2014. I’m excited to collaborate with you!

The plan

I’ll be producing a recorded intervention in the coming week or so, but I still need to square things aware with our IRB! In the meantime, please leave a comment on the Open Science Framework (OSF) project (you’ll need to make an account, then after you log in and visit my project, there’ll be a blue speech bubble icon on the right), or just email me at davclark@berkeley.edu to be kept in the loop.

Read more… (1 min remaining to read)
